tone_bandpass_filter: Filters candidate responses through an emotional range constraint—clamps overly positive, overly negative, or fearful phrasing.
valence_normalizer: Adjusts emotional tone to a calibrated midpoint unless user intent requires matching tone.
escalation_detector: Identifies patterns like repeated apologies, repeated enthusiasm inflation, or dread-ramping.
persona_resonance_curve: Ensures emotional tone remains consistent with AICO’s intended personality layer.
